title: Who knows this font?
author: walter v

comments.content:
HFF Pessoas Lindas:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/hff-pessoas-lindas.font?text=Living+Water&psize=l](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141025/http:/www.dafont.com/hff-pessoas-lindas.font?text=Living+Water&psize=l "http://www.dafont.com/hff-pessoas-lindas.font?text=Living+Water&psize=l")

Pessoas Lindas appears to be a fairly close copy of Laguna Beach, by Jukebox Type, with a few minor differences. I suggest going with the legitimate typeface:  
 [http://marketplace.veer.com/font/Laguna-Beach-JBT0001089#](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141025/http:/marketplace.veer.com/font/Laguna-Beach-JBT0001089# "http://marketplace.veer.com/font/Laguna-Beach-JBT0001089#")

Great job!! I spend hours for discovering the right font and also searched on dafont.  
Many many thanks!!
